# Objective

The objective of this [survey](https://forms.gle/791dhPnxgLVPzgyG9) was to understand the influence ads have on
people's purchase decisions and on what aspect of ads do people focus on the
most.

# Required libraries

The following `R` libraries are used for this analysis.

```{r}
library(dplyr) # for wrangling data
library(ggplot2) # for making plots
library(readr) # for reading data
```
